229//*****************************************************************************
230//
231// Type definitions.
232//
233//*****************************************************************************
234#define am_hal_ble_buffer(A) \
235 union \
236 { \
237 uint32_t words[(A + 3) >> 2]; \
238 uint8_t bytes[A]; \
239 }
240
242typedef void (*am_hal_ble_transfer_complete_cb_t)(uint8_t *pui8Data, uint32_t ui32Length, void *pvContext);
243
244//
246//
247typedef struct
248{
249 uint32_t ui32Type;
250 uint32_t ui32Length;
251 uint32_t ui32CRC;
252 const uint32_t *pui32Data;
253}
254am_hal_ble_patch_t;

256//
258//
259typedef struct
260{
261 // HCI interface options.
262 uint32_t ui32SpiClkCfg;
263 uint32_t ui32ReadThreshold;
264 uint32_t ui32WriteThreshold;
265
266 // BLE options.
267 uint32_t ui32BleClockConfig;
268 uint32_t ui32ClockDrift;
269 uint32_t ui32SleepClockDrift;
270 bool bAgcEnabled;
271 bool bSleepEnabled;
272
273 // Patches
274 bool bUseDefaultPatches;
275}
276am_hal_ble_config_t;

283//*****************************************************************************
284//
286//
287//*****************************************************************************
288typedef struct
289{
290 uint32_t *pui32Data;
291 uint8_t pui8Offset[3];
292 uint8_t ui8OffsetLen;
293 uint16_t ui16Length;
294 uint8_t ui8Command;
295 uint8_t ui8RepeatCount;
296 bool bContinue;
297 am_hal_ble_transfer_complete_cb_t pfnTransferCompleteCB;
298 void *pvContext;
299}
300am_hal_ble_transfer_t;

302//*****************************************************************************
303//
305//
309//
310//*****************************************************************************
311#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_BD_ADDR_OPCODE 0xFC32
312#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_BD_ADDR_LENGTH (4 + 6)
313
314#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_TX_POWER_OPCODE 0xFC3B
315#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_TX_POWER_LENGTH (4 + 3)
316
317#define AM_HAL_BLE_READ_VERSIONS_OPCODE 0xFD01
318#define AM_HAL_BLE_READ_VERSIONS_LENGTH (4 + 0)
319
320#define AM_HAL_BLE_PLF_REGISTER_READ_OPCODE 0xFD02
321#define AM_HAL_BLE_PLF_REGISTER_READ_LENGTH (4 + 4)
322
323#define AM_HAL_BLE_PLF_REGISTER_WRITE_OPCODE 0xFD03
324#define AM_HAL_BLE_PLF_REGISTER_WRITE_LENGTH (4 + 8)
325
326#define AM_HAL_BLE_GET_RSSI_OPCODE 0x1405
327#define AM_HAL_BLE_GET_RSSI_LENGTH (4 + 0)
328
329#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_SLEEP_OPCODE 0xFD09
330#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_SLEEP_LENGTH (4 + 0)
331
332#define AM_HAL_BLE_SPI_SENDFRAME_OPCODE 0xFD04
333#define AM_HAL_BLE_SPI_SENDFRAME_LENGTH (4 + 1)
334
335#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_BD_ADDR_CMD(...) {0x01, 0x32, 0xFC, 0x06, __VA_ARGS__}
336#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_TX_POWER_CMD(...) {0x01, 0x3B, 0xFC, 0x03, __VA_ARGS__}
337#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_READ_VERSIONS_CMD() {0x01, 0x01, 0xFD, 0x00}
338#define AM_HAL_BLE_PLF_REGISTER_READ_CMD(...) {0x01, 0x02, 0xFD, 0x04, __VA_ARGS__}
339#define AM_HAL_BLE_PLF_REGISTER_WRITE_CMD(...) {0x01, 0x03, 0xFD, 0x08, __VA_ARGS__}
340#define AM_HAL_BLE_GET_RSSI_CMD() {0x01, 0x05, 0x14, 0x00}
341#define AM_HAL_BLE_SET_SLEEP_CMD() {0x01, 0x09, 0xFD, 0x00}
342#define AM_HAL_BLE_SPI_SENDFRAME_CMD(...) {0x01, 0x04, 0xFD, 0x01, __VA_ARGS__}
343

350{
352 am_hal_handle_prefix_t prefix;
353
355 uint32_t ui32Module;
356
358 bool bUseDefaultPatches;
359
361 am_hal_ble_transfer_t sCurrentTransfer;
362
365 am_hal_ble_transfer_t sSavedTransfer;
366
368 uint32_t ui32TransferIndex;
369
371 bool bPatchComplete;
372
374 bool bContinuePacket;
375
378 bool bLastPacketWasTX;
379
381 bool bSavedPacket;
382
384 bool bBusy;
385
387 bool bCmdComplete;
388
390 bool bDmaComplete;
391
393 bool bFlowControlComplete;
394}
395am_hal_ble_state_t;

1034#ifdef AM_DEBUG_BLE_TIMING
1035
1036#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_01 11
1037#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_02 28
1038#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_03 26
1039#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_04 4
1040#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_05 18
1041#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_06 14
1042#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_07 6
1043#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_08 45
1044#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_09 12
1045#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_10 13
1046#define BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_11 10
1047#define BLE_LOCK_TRACE_PIN BLE_DEBUG_TRACE_11
1048
1049#define am_hal_debug_gpio_set(x) am_hal_gpio_state_write(x, AM_HAL_GPIO_OUTPUT_SET)
1050
1051#define am_hal_debug_gpio_clear(x) am_hal_gpio_state_write(x, AM_HAL_GPIO_OUTPUT_CLEAR)
1052
1053#define am_hal_debug_gpio_toggle(x) am_hal_gpio_state_write(x, AM_HAL_GPIO_OUTPUT_TOGGLE)
1054
1055#define am_hal_debug_gpio_pinconfig(x) am_hal_gpio_pinconfig(x, g_AM_HAL_GPIO_OUTPUT)
1056
1057#else
1058
1059#define am_hal_debug_gpio_set(...)
1060#define am_hal_debug_gpio_clear(...)
1061#define am_hal_debug_gpio_toggle(...)
1062#define am_hal_debug_gpio_pinconfig(...)
1063
1064#endif // AM_DEBUG_BLE_TIMING
